profile.name: Frey
profile.title: Priestess of Light Frey
profile.story: An apprentice priestess serving the Goddess Lua, the church has high expectations of her as a future priestess. From the early years of her training, she has amazed even the high priests with her strong faith and natural talent for channeling Lua's power. She herself considers priesthood her destined path, and her kind heart reflects her resolve. However, she shows no mercy toward evildoers.

1.name: Miraculous Light
1.description: Dispels harmful effects from the ally with the lowest current HP and restores HP [ffc800]529*(1+0.3*Skill Level)+330.6% ATK[-] [64ffff]3 times[-]. When healing the target, nearby allies are additionally healed for [64ffff]40%[-] of the healing amount.

2.name: Blessings of Light
2.description: Grants all allies a shield that absorbs [ffc800]1080*(1+0.3*Skill Level)+675.6% ATK[-] damage for [64ffff]7 sec[-]. While the shield lasts, the target’s ATK increases by [64ff64]25%[-], Healing Power by [64ff64]65%[-], and Status Resistance by [64ff64]600[-].

3.name: Heaven's Vengeance
3.description: Deals [ffc800]177*(1+0.3*Skill Level)+110.8% ATK[-] Magic DMG to the target and nearby enemies [64ffff]6 times[-], then inflicts [fa96fa]Blind[-] for [64ffff]3.5 sec[-], and increases Magic DMG taken by [64ff64]25%[-] for [64ffff]10 sec[-]. This skill applies Critical Rate [64ff64]500 higher[-].

4.name: Goddess Grace
4.description:
Magic DMG taken is reduced by [64ff64]15%[-].
At the start of each battle or every [64ffff]14 sec[-], restores [64ff64]15%[-] of Max HP to the [64ffff]1 allies[-] with the lowest current HP, and increases their Magic DEF by [64ff64]60*(1+0.3*Skill Level)[-] for [64ffff]7 sec[-].

light.effect: Mana cost increases by 1000, but the target count changes to 2.

dark.effect: Healed allies take 25% less Magic DMG for 10 sec.

light.effect: Mana cost increases by 1000 and damage increases by 80%.

dark.effect: Changes the target to random enemies.

light.effect: Reduces DMG the target takes from Non-Hero enemies by 40% for the duration of Skill.

uw.name: God's Authority, Rosmerta
uw.description: Every {1} sec, heals the {2} allies with the lowest current HP by {3}% of ATK, and increases the Critical Rate of the {5} allies with the highest ATK by {6}, and Critical DMG by {7}% for {4} sec.
uw.story: The Angels are said to be closer to Lua than any other race. A high ranking angel called Rosmerta bestowed her core to the Church of Lua, and they crafted this holy staff from the core's divine energy.

1.name: Forgotten Arbiter's Feather
1.description: [Miraculous Light] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and target becomes Immune to DMG for 1 sec.
1.story: Feather from the Guardian of the Sun. Feather of an Angel who saved the people by fighting against the Demons in the past. He left his feather as proof of his promise to return once again if the world falls into chaos. An artifact of the Church of Lua that summons holy rays of the sun to blind the enemy.

2.name: Miraculous Medal
2.description: [Blessings of Light] Increases the shield amount by 50% and recovers 100 Mana every sec for 4 sec.
2.story:
Medal made by the saintess of miracles, Yvonne, with the revelation of the goddess. 
The Medal of Miracles is a sacred artifact that contains the magic of light. It is said that saintess Yvonne saved the city that was invaded by the demons with the blessing of light that was boosted with this medal.

3.name: Angel's Egg
3.description: [Heaven’s Vengeance] increases the target’s M.DMG taken by 20% for 10 sec and extends Blind duration by 0.6 sec.
3.story:
The treasure that Frey loves dearly.
It is a crystal orb that Frey had when she was found as an infant under the World Tree. Frey named it Angel's Egg for its luster like angel's hair, and she's cherished it her entire life.

4.name: Angelic Advent
4.description: [Goddess Grace] Upon activation, dispels all negative effects from the target and increases the target's Heal Rate by 20% for the duration of skill.
4.story:
An old storybook owned by Frey.
It was the first storybook ever given to young Frey as a present, and it tells of a war between the Angels and Demons.
Frey particularly likes the part where the Angels emerge victorious after defeating all the Demons.
